definition: square/power or involution (math.)/upright/honest/fair and square/direction/side/party (to a contract, dispute etc)/place/method/prescription (medicine)/just when/only or just/classifier for square things/abbr. for square or cubic meter

sentences.english: All the quotation on the list are subject to our final confirmation.
sentences.chinese: 單中所有價格以我方最後確認爲準。

sentences.english: We would suggest that you strengthen the cartons with double straps.
sentences.chinese: 因此，我方建議用兩根包裝帶加固紙板箱。

sentences.english: Have you received the specifications as shown in our catalog?
sentences.chinese: 你們收到了按我方目次所列的產物規格了嗎？

sentences.english: The difference between our price and your counteroffer is too wide.
sentences.chinese: 我方的價格與你方還盤之間差距太大。

sentences.english: The enemy attacked in great numbers but our men stood their ground.
sentences.chinese: 敵人大舉進攻，但我方戰士仍堅守陣地。

sentences.english: After we fired back, there was no further response from the DRPK.
sentences.chinese: 我方回擊後，朝方沒有進一步迴應。

sentences.english: Our radio communications have been intercepted by the enemy.
sentences.chinese: 我方的無線通信被敵方竊聽了。

sentences.english: We no longer manufacture pure cotton shirts.
sentences.chinese: 我方已不再生產純棉襯衫。

sentences.english: We thank you for your consideration in making us the consignment of 30 bales of cotton goods.
sentences.chinese: 貴方欲委託敝公司銷售棉織品30包，我方不勝感激。

sentences.english: If you accept our counter-offer, we'll persuade the customers to place an order with you.
sentences.chinese: 如果你方接受我方還盤，我們將勸客戶向你方訂購。

sentences.english: We suggest that you reinforce the cartons with twice belts.
sentences.chinese: 我方建議用兩跟包裝帶加固紙箱。

sentences.english: We refer to our Order No. 532 for women's blouses and sweaters.
sentences.chinese: 茲談及我方532號女式襯衫及毛衣的訂單。

sentences.english: Our warships bottled up the enemy fleet in the harbour.
sentences.chinese: 我方軍艦把敵方艦隊圍困在港口內。

sentences.english: No enemy was contacted by our patrols on all our fronts today.
sentences.chinese: 今天在各條戰線上敵人均未與我方遭遇。

sentences.english: As soon as we are able to make an offer, we 'll cable you.
sentences.chinese: 一旦我方能發盤，就會電告你方。

sentences.english: We can obtain the same quality through another channel at much lower price than that you quoted us.
sentences.chinese: 我方可以以比你方報價低的價格從其他渠道購買商品。

definition: to go to war/to engage in war
